input.sentences: today was the day of the race . they started out in the water .
after that was the five mile run .
[male] pulled ahead at the last minute .
here he is at the front of everyone almost halfway through .
output.sentences: The triathlon started with the swimming part and we couldn't really tell which one was Chris.
When they got out of the water and climbed onto their bikes, Chris wasn't too far back.
In the running part, he was with a couple of other people near the front.
Slowly, he started to pull away from the pack.
By the halfway mark, he was in the lead!
